articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.title: The Vivo X100 Pro and X100 are launching internationally - The Verge
articles.description: Vivo’s X100 Pro and X100 are no longer exclusive to China. The X100 Pro is coming to Europe with its big one-inch sensor camera and a revamped telephoto lens.
articles.content:
Vivos X100 Pro offers another massive camera sensor to an international audience
Vivos X100 Pro offers another massive camera sensor to an international audience
